<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---HexagonLoadStoreWidening.cpp---------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// HexagonStoreWidening:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace sequences of &quot;narrow&quot; stores to adjacent memory locations with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a fewer &quot;wide&quot; stores that have the same effect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, replace:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   S4&#95;storeirb&#95;io  %100, 0, 0   ; store-immediate-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   S4&#95;storeirb&#95;io  %100, 1, 0   ; store-immediate-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   S4&#95;storeirh&#95;io  %100, 0, 0   ; store-immediate-halfword</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The above is the general idea.  The actual cases handled by the code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may be a bit more complex.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The purpose of this pass is to reduce the number of outstanding stores,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or as one could say, &quot;reduce store queue pressure&quot;.  Also, wide stores</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mean fewer stores, and since there are only two memory instructions allowed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// per packet, it also means fewer packets, and ultimately fewer cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// HexagonLoadWidening does the same thing as HexagonStoreWidening but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for Loads. Here, we try to replace 4-byte Loads with register-pair loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %2:intregs = L2&#95;loadri&#95;io %1:intregs, 0 :: (load (s32) from %ptr1, align 8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %3:intregs = L2&#95;loadri&#95;io %1:intregs, 4 :: (load (s32) from %ptr2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %4:doubleregs = L2&#95;loadrd&#95;io %1:intregs, 0 :: (load (s64) from %ptr1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %2:intregs = COPY %4.isub&#95;lo:doubleregs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %3:intregs = COPY %4.isub&#95;hi:doubleregs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoadWidening for 8 and 16-bit loads is not useful as we end up generating 2N</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insts to replace N loads: 1 widened load, N bitwise and, N - 1 shifts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoninstrinfo-h">HexagonInstrInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonregisterinfo-h">HexagonRegisterInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonsubtarget-h">HexagonSubtarget.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallptrset-h">llvm/ADT/SmallPtrSet.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">llvm/Analysis/AliasAnalysis.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memorylocation-h">llvm/Analysis/MemoryLocation.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinebasicblock-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineBasicBlock.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunction.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionpass-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunctionPass.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstr-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineInstr.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbuilder-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineInstrBuilder.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinememoperand-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineMemOperand.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoperand-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineOperand.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inspect a machine basic block, and generate groups out of loads/stores</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// encountered in the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A load/store group is a group of loads or stores that use the same base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register, and which can be reordered within that group without altering the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantics of the program.  A single group could be widened as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a whole, if there existed a single load/store instruction with the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantics as the entire group.  In many cases, a single group may need more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than one wide load or store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonLoadStoreWidening::createGroups(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            InstrGroupList &amp;StoreGroups) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse all instructions and if we encounter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a load/store, then try to create a group starting at that instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i.e. a sequence of independent loads/stores that can be widened.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &amp;(&#42;I);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!handledInstType(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ProcessedInsts.count(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found a store.  Try to create a store group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstrGroup <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    createGroup(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a single load/store group.  The insts need to be independent between</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseReg = getBaseAddressRegister(BaseInst);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset of a load/store will put restrictions on how wide the inst can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be.  Offsets in loads/stores of size 2^n bytes need to have the n lowest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits be 0  If the first inst already exhausts the offset limits, quit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Test this by checking if the next wider size would exceed the limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For post-increment instructions, the increment amount needs to follow the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same rule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OffsetOrIncVal = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HII-&gt;isPostIncrement(&#42;FirstMI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OffsetOrIncVal = getPostIncrementValue(FirstMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OffsetOrIncVal = FirstOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((2 &#42; SizeAccum - 1) &amp; OffsetOrIncVal) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Instruction cannot be widened as the offset/postinc&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; value: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; getPostIncrementValue(FirstMI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; is invalid in the widened version\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OG.push&#95;back(FirstMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a> = FirstMI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pow2Num will be the largest number of elements in OG such that the sum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of sizes of loads/stores 0...Pow2Num-1 will be a power of 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pow2Num = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pow2Size = SizeAccum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HavePostInc = HII-&gt;isPostIncrement(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Be greedy: keep accumulating insts as long as they are to adjacent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memory locations, and as long as the total number of bytes stored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not exceed the limit (MaxSize).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of when the total size covered is a power of 2, since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is a size a single load/store can cover.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstrGroup::iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Begin + 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != End; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;S2 = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insts are sorted, so if S1 and S2 are not adjacent, there won&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any other store to fill the &quot;hole&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!areAdjacent(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>, S2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cannot widen two post increments, need to return two registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with incremented values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HavePostInc &amp;&amp; HII-&gt;isPostIncrement(&#42;S2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S2Size = <a href="#abef29ef0fe3e5fab1eb42d05e496291b">getMemTarget</a>(S2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#a0ffa31699dee0349f9b9ae1d3ccb21f1">getSize</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a935a116f6c8690449f4eddd56a99504b">getValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SizeAccum + S2Size &gt; std::min(MaxSize, Alignment))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OG.push&#95;back(S2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SizeAccum += S2Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(SizeAccum)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pow2Num = OG.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pow2Size = SizeAccum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((2 &#42; Pow2Size - 1) &amp; FirstOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a> = S2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The insts don&#39;t add up to anything that can be widened.  Clean up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pow2Num &lt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OG.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only leave the loads/stores being widened.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OG.resize(Pow2Num);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalSize = Pow2Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given an &quot;old group&quot; OG of insts, create a &quot;new group&quot; NG of instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to replace them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonLoadStoreWidening::createWideInsts(InstrGroup &amp;OG, InstrGroup &amp;NG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a> == WideningMode::Store) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createWideStores(OG, NG, TotalSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createWideLoads(OG, NG, TotalSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given an &quot;old group&quot; OG of stores, create a &quot;new group&quot; NG of instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to replace them.  Ideally, NG would only have a single instruction in it,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// but that may only be possible for store-immediate.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XXX Current limitations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - only handle a TotalSize of up to 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Creating wide stores\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TotalSize &gt; MaxWideSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Acc = 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value accumulator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shift = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HaveImm = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HaveReg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : OG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand">MachineMemOperand</a> &amp;MMO = <a href="#abef29ef0fe3e5fab1eb42d05e496291b">getMemTarget</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;SO = HII-&gt;isPostIncrement(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(2); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ab313591ae4ea1e3a4ab59121a7dc2a2b">getType</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba066f84460d9f7b61d54b187555756ef6">MachineOperand::MO&#95;Immediate</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Have store immediate\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NBits = MMO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#abcceb535a4bb1e23c320e7628476bd5d">getSizeInBits</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#ac69af0ff907e2fce2761442c786e5826">toRaw</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = (0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFU &gt;&gt; (64 - NBits));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val = (SO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>() &amp; Mask) &lt;&lt; Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Acc |= Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Shift += NBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba99b874c6560305fd292d20f6a06da166">MachineOperand::MO&#95;Register</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HaveReg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unhandled store\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace instructions from the old group OG with instructions from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new group NG.  Conceptually, remove all instructions in OG, and then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert all instructions in NG, starting at where the first instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from OG was (in the order in which they appeared in the basic block).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (The ordering in OG does not have to match the order in the basic block.)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need to establish the insertion point.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Break up the group into smaller groups, each of which can be replaced by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a single wide load/store.  Widen each such smaller group and replace the old</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions with the widened ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonLoadStoreWidening::processGroup(InstrGroup &amp;Group) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process a single basic block: create the load/store groups, and replace them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the widened insts, if possible.  Processing of each basic block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is independent from processing of any other basic block.  This transfor-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mation could be stopped after having processed any basic block without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any ill effects (other than not having performed widening in the unpro-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cessed blocks).  Also, the basic blocks can be processed in any order.</span></CodeLine>
